Hello friends, today we’re launching https://cooperative.computer !

It’s like dGaaS (De-Googling as a Service). Nextcloud files storage, contacts and calendar syncing and a Matrix account all for £3 per month.

- No ads
- No data mining
- No BS

AND THAT’S NOT ALL! Don’t like it? Change it! Cooperative.computer will eventually be its own cooperative where the members decide how it’s run.

Come talk to us on Matrix today! Operators are standing-by. https://matrix.to/#/#general:cooperative.computer

title: A forgotten children's book by Langston Hughes and Elmer W. Brown emerges in Cleveland

last_post.content:
A forgotten children's book by Langston Hughes and Elmer W. Brown emerges in Cleveland
via ⁦ @ideastream.org

Students from Northeast Ohio are learning the basics of art curation as they share a forgotten story about two artistic legends of Cleveland.

Artist Elmer W. Brown and writer Langston Hughes met in the 1930s at Karamu House, where Brown was an actor and graphic artist and Hughes a playwright.

https://www.ideastream.org/arts-culture/2023-05-25/a-forgotten-childrens-book-by-langston-hughes-and-elmer-w-brown-emerges-in-cleveland

Wij zoek een universitair docent voor ons team. Doe jij onderzoek op het gebied van digitalisering, artificial intelligence vanuit een cognitiewetenschappelijk kader? Onderzoek jij hoe nieuwe en geavanceerde tools zoals machine learning van invloed kunnen zijn op brein en cognitie? Heb jij interesse in het verbeteren van methodologie in de context van digitalisering en besluitvorming? Als dit belangrijke vragen zijn in jouw onderzoek, dan zijn we op zoek naar jou! https://www.academictransfer.com/en/328636/universitair-docent-digital-decision-support-digitalization-decision-making-and-the-brain/

If we can reduce this inefficiency in science it should benefit scientists and society, so it’s worth examining where we can improve.

We also think honestly talking about what you have in your file drawer (e.g., https://doi.org/10.1080/2153599X.2020.1729233) is important. Maybe others can pick up a project you can’t get to. Non-publication is associated with bias, but logistical issues might a more important cause.

If you have any feedback before we submit this, do let me know!

New preprint: An Inception Cohort Study Quantifying How Many Registered Studies are Published. We look at how many research studies are performed but remain published after at least 4 years, and estimate this is 42% of registered studies. https://psyarxiv.com/5hkjz

title: Archäologisches Kolloquium: 'Surveying Across the Frontiers of Hatti and Tarhuntassa: The Konya Ereğli Survey Project (K EYAR)'

last_post.content:
On Monday, 5 June, Prof. Çiğdem Maner, Istanbul, will present the Konya Ereğli Survey Project (KEYAR) at the Institute for Prehistoric and Protohistoric Archaeology of #UniKiel. His talk "Surveying Across the Frontiers of #Hatti and #Tarhuntassa" is part of the Archaeological Colloquium. Interested people are cordially invited to attend on site or online. For more information go to https://www.ufg.uni-kiel.de/de/aktuelles/events/vortraege/archaeologisches-kolloquium-surveying-across-the-frontiers-of-hatti-and-tarhuntassa-the-konya-eregli-survey-project-k-eyar

title: Call for proposals: Open Infrastructure Fund

last_post.content:
📢 Funding opportunity!

We're thrilled to launch the Open Infrastructure Fund pilot, which offers 5-25k USD to projects worldwide that strengthen resilience + increase adoption of #openinfrastructure underpinning research & scholarship.

We are committed to reserving at least 60% of the funds available to applicants working in/services widely adopted in Low and Middle Income Economies (LMIEs).

Applications are accepted in both Spanish and English.

Find out more at https://investinopen.org/blog/open-infrastructure-fund-pilot-cfp/

title: Bienne: Accident mortel, la police enquête pour comprendre qui est responsable

last_post.content:
"Mercredi, au lendemain d’un accident mortel pour une cycliste de 43 ans, mère de deux petits enfants, les responsabilités ne sont pas établies, à Bienne."

Plus loin :

"«Une bande cyclable n’est pas obligatoire: c’est du luxe!» observe un policier. Son opinion: «À chacun de se comporter correctement dans la circulation, quoi qu’il arrive». Certains cyclistes préfèrent traverser ce carrefour comme les piétons, par le passage jaune."

Je n'ai pas de mots.

last_post.content:
Edit: Ticket ist wieder verfügbar.

Lust auf @republica, aber kein Ticket? Ich verschenke eines.

Falls du Schüler*in, Studierende, Auszubildende, Volontär*in, Trainee, Bürgergeld-Empfänger*in, FSJler*in, BFDler*in, Rentner*in, Mensch älter als 65 oder Mensch mit Behinderung bist, schreib mir eine Nachricht. Du musst weder deinen Twitteraccount gelöscht haben, noch zu meinem Vortrag #AbschiedVonTwitter kommen. https://re-publica.com/de/session/abschied-von-twitter-er-ist-noetig-und-faellt-schwer-aber-zusammen-schaffen-wir-das #rp23

title: Adversarial Clean Label Backdoor Attacks and Defenses on Text Classification Systems

last_post.content:
📝 Adversarial Clean Label Backdoor Attacks and Defenses on Text Classification Systems 📚

"First adversarially perturbs in-class examples and then replaces them with them during the training phase of the targeted model, so that the model is trained on perturbed in-class examples, while retaining the labels." [gal30b+] 🤖 #CL #CR

title: A Sustainable Solution: Compostable Wind Turbine Blades

last_post.content:
Meanwhile, in "the future is fungal" AND renewable energy news... 🍄 🍃

Researchers at UC Davis are working on developing compostable, ecologically sound wind turbine blades made from bamboo and mycelium. Sounds like they're still in the early stages but have built a prototype that they are testing on campus.

Here's hoping their efforts pay off!

https://www.ucdavis.edu/climate/news/a-sustainable-solution-wind-turbine-blades

______
#wind #RenewableEnergy #sustainability #mycelium #bamboo

title: Add glossaries to markdown and quarto documents

last_post.content:
The glossary #rstats package is now on CRAN!

Glossary is a lightweight solution for making glossaries in educational materials written in quarto or R Markdown. This package provides functions to link terms in text to their definitions in an external glossary file, as well as create a glossary table of all linked terms at the end of a section.

https://debruine.github.io/glossary/

@Patricia @HalvarFlake ExoBPF sounds interesting and there was a presentation at Linux Plumbers Conference titled “A proof-carrying approach to building correct and flexible in-kernel verifiers”.

The main idea is that user space produces proofs for the eBPF code it wants to run and the kernel checks the proof against a spec prior to accepting that code.

Slides:
https://homes.cs.washington.edu/~lukenels/slides/2021-09-23-lpc21.pdf

Repository:
https://github.com/uw-unsat/exoverifier

@Patricia @HalvarFlake ExoBPF sounds interesting and there was a presentation at Linux Plumbers Conference titled “A proof-carrying approach to building correct and flexible in-kernel verifiers”.

The main idea is that user space produces proofs for the eBPF code it wants to run and the kernel checks the proof against a spec prior to accepting that code.

Slides:
https://homes.cs.washington.edu/~lukenels/slides/2021-09-23-lpc21.pdf

Repository:
https://github.com/uw-unsat/exoverifier

Prompted by the recent thread/inquiry by @Patricia with @HalvarFlake’s reply I went to see if somebody was now working on applying formal methods to the eBPF verifier. Turns out there are some folks at the University of Texas at Austin that released a paper titled “Formal Verification of the Linux Kernel eBPF Verifier Range Analysis”

Paper:
https://sanjit-bhat.github.io/assets/pdf/ebpf-verifier-range-analysis22.pdf

#formalmethods #linux #ebpf

L'événement Who run the tech, organisé le 30 novembre prochain à #Rennes, fait son appel à oratRICES sur des sujets #tech (et non sur la place des femmes dans la tech).

Il n'y aura QUE des oratrices (le public sera mixte bien sûr).

Avis donc aux #femmes qui travaillent dans la tech (et vous êtes plus nombreuses ici) : vous avez des choses à dire sur votre domaine d'expertise alors n'hésitez pas à postuler ! (Accompagnement à la prise de parole en public sur demande)
